text: Pachyceramyia is a genus of house flies, insects in the family Muscidae. There are about six described species in Pachyceramyia. ==Species== * Pachyceramyia cordyluroides (Atein, 1898) * Pachyceramyia littoralis (Malloch, 1917) * Pachyceramyia longispina (Malloch, 1923) * Pachyceramyia mallitosa (Huckett, 1936) * Pachyceramyia parvimaculata (Stein, 1920) * Pachyceramyia robusta (Johnson, 1917) ==References== ==Further reading== * ==External links== * Category:Muscidae genera
title: Pachyceramyia
